post.description: Create a new order with order items. Supports optional geolocation data (latitude/longitude) for delivery orders to enable location-based features.

Creates a delivery for the specified order and assigns a driver. If a delivery already exists in PENDING status, it will be updated with the new driver information. Returns an error if a delivery already exists with a non-PENDING status.

400.description: Invalid request data or delivery already exists with non-PENDING status

200.description: Driver assigned successfully (delivery created or updated)

post.description: Assign a delivery to a driver. Creates a new delivery or updates an existing one if it's in PENDING status. Returns an error if a delivery already exists with a non-PENDING status.

400.description: Invalid request data or delivery already exists with non-PENDING status
